name: trollsofthenorth-ludumdare41
description: ## Developer guide 1. To clone the repository run: `git clone git@github.com:trollsofthenorth/ludumdare41.git` 2. To change the directory to the cloned repository run: `cd ludumdare41` 3. To install the dependencies run: `npm install` 4. Write tests located in the `./tests/` directory. 5. Write code in the `./src/` directory. 6. To test the code run: `npm test` 7. To build and start a demo server, run: `npm start` 8. To fetch the latest changes run: `git fetch --all` 9. To pull the latest changes, run: `git pull`
author: trollsofthenorth
